function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Organizations failing to comply with community measures for controlling COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Increase in the risk of disease transmission within the organization and the wider community","Mitigation":"Training and awareness programs for employees, implementation of workplace redesign for social distancing","Technologies":"Workplace layout design software, signage solutions for agile configuration design","People":"Employees, customers, general public","Owner":"Organizational management and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Inadequate assessment of real estate portfolios leading to ineffective workplace modification activities","Impact":"Failure to create a safe work environment, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Thorough assessment of real estate portfolios, identification of modification indicators, implementation of workplace redesign for social distancing","Technologies":"Real estate portfolio assessment software, workplace modification planning tools","People":"Employees, visitors, general public","Owner":"Facilities management and workplace safety professionals"},{"Description":"Ineffective implementation of workplace modification activities during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the organization and challenges for the implementation process","Mitigation":"Training and awareness programs for employees, adoption of specific risk control approaches (e.g., building system assessment and adaptation, personal hygiene education)","Technologies":"Training management systems, building system assessment tools","People":"Employees, visitors, general public","Owner":"Organizational management, facilities management, workplace safety professionals"}]}
